item.description:
Ok after a long work week, time to head out some place comfortable, fun, and meet and greet. Nothing like have a great night with a LIVE POPULAR BAND :-)

 

Capone's lounge offers live bands with a varied mix of dance music every Thursday, Friday and Saturday. There is a $5 cover on Friday and Saturday. We have 2 bars and 2 dance floors. Proper dress is required; casual is fine, but please no hats or sleeveless shirts (men). I wiil " Meet" you in the lounge at 8pm, and will do the introductions, look for a table and then off to the dance floor. If anyone gets hungry they serve food in the restuarant and the lounge. The key to meeting your group is to get there before the noise of the band starts. 

 

BAND: Lee Hawkins

Time: 9pm-1am
item.name: Dancing at Capones to Lee Hawkins Band
